channel.title: equipment on /r/blacksmith Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in equipment on /r/blacksmith Knowledge Base

item.title: Build Your Own Tools
item.description: Forges # Building a propane forge Zoeller forge Brake drum forge Just a Box of Dirt (JABOD) Ribbon burner build guide Ovens # Heat treat oven Heat treat kiln Grinders # DIY 2x72 grinder | Motor info Tool mounting # Tool mounting help guide (includes power hammers, grinders, lathes, etc) Sledge anvil mount Large chunk of round steel mount

item.title: Vendors
item.description: Gas forges # Zoeller Forge (forge parts and burners) HybridBurners Anvilfire venturi Commercial ribbon burners Mr Volcano | Instagram Chili Forge Steel # New Jersey Steel Baron (blade steel) Admiral Steel Dictum (Japanese steels) McMaster Carr Tool Steel of California Online Metals Atlantic33 Tool Steel Sb Specialty Metals (exotic steels) eBay steel 1045/4140 | steel bar drop ends Anvil retailers # Atlas Knifemaker Texas Farrier Supply Centaur Forge Accessories # Rivets & Bolts

item.title: Beginner Equipment Recommendations
item.description: Anvil # Large embedded 12lb+ sledge hammer (recommended) Any large chunk of steel (search eBay for 1045 steel or ask to purchase at a local machine shop) New anvils from retailer (not Harbor Freight) Upright railroad track (Google Anvilfire) Hammer # 2 lb Nordic Hammer Any Brent Bailey hammer (around 2 lbs) 2 lb crosspein or rounding hammer Tongs # 3/8" bolt tongs Wolf jaw tongs Quick & Dirty Tongs Ken’s Custom Iron Quick Tongs Forge # Mr Volcano Just a Box of Dirt Steel # Assorted 1/4"-3/4" (6mm-19mm) mild steel in square and round stock 1/4" x 1" flat bar, 3/8" x 1" flat bar 1045/5160 for tool steel 5160/1075/1084 for blade steel
